name: Medieval Tactics
description:
Medieval Tactics is an Isometric TurnBased Strategy Game. Heavy inspired in the game "Into the breach", but do it in a few days and for the PSP.

The objetive of the game is to avoid the destrucction of the buildings. Yo must use the cursor to move ONLY (:eye_blik) the soldier and attack the enemy.

Each round is generated dynamically.

LOT OF THANKS to Iridescence. YT channel:  https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCSTmaB4YZmnyUSAoerATnsg/videos/videos

Source Code: https://github.com/psjuan97/Stardust-Celeste/tree/master

Sound: https://opengameart.org/content/chiptune-medieval-the-old-tower-inn

Art: https://gamer-ant.itch.io/isometric-medieval-tactics (paid it)

 

Source Code: https://github.com/psjuan97/Stardust-Celeste/tree/master
